meanings.definition: Excessive amount or quantity beyond what is necessary.
meanings.sent1: The superfluousness of decorations in the room made it feel cluttered.
meanings.sent2: The superfluousness of extra toppings on the pizza made it too heavy to lift.
meanings.sent3: The superfluousness of adding more sugar to the cake made it too sweet for anyone to eat.
meanings.sent4: The superfluousness of words in his speech drowned out the important message he wanted to convey.
meanings.sent5: The superfluousness of accessories on her outfit made her look like a walking jewelry store.

meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to remove any superfluousness information from their essays.
meanings.sent2: The extra buttons on the shirt were purely superfluousness and served no purpose.
meanings.sent3: His superfluousness comments during the meeting made everyone roll their eyes.
meanings.sent4: The superfluousness details in the report distracted readers from the main findings.
meanings.sent5: Her superfluousness apologies only made the situation more awkward.
